original_title: US push to build naval drone fleet ‘not going well’ – Reuters — RT World News
article_summary:
"FDA Warns of Radioactive Shrimp in Walmart's Great Value Brand: Potentially contaminated frozen shrimp imported from Indonesia may contain cesium-137, a radioactive isotope that can cause DNA damage and increase cancer risk. The FDA has urged consumers not to consume, sell, or serve the affected shrimp, and Walmart has removed it from stores."

"Bolivian President Criticizes US Military Deployment in Latin America: Bolivian President Luis Arce accused the US of using the 'war on drugs' as a cover to seek political and economic control in Latin America, particularly in the southern Caribbean region. Arce also criticized the US for its actions against Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro and called for addressing the root causes of drug trafficking at home."</s>
